about_the_game:
"About This Game:

Embark on an epic journey in this captivating story-rich roguelike game, where you'll dive into a mystical world of gods and ancient legends. As a fearless hunter, your mission is to track down and confront the very gods that shaped the cosmos. Prepare to be tested by challenging 2D platforming obstacles and engage in intense battles that revolve around the unique power of blood manipulation.

Uncover a rich narrative as you explore a beautifully handcrafted universe filled with secrets and hidden treasures. Every decision you make and every path you choose will shape your destiny, offering a dynamic and replayable experience. Unleash your creativity and tactical prowess as you adapt to different environments, master deadly abilities, and discover the untold truths hidden within the realm of the divine.

Key Features:

Engrossing Story: Immerse yourself in a deep and immersive storyline that unfolds as you venture deeper into a world of gods and ancient mysteries.
Roguelike Elements: Experience the thrill of permadeath and procedural generation, ensuring each playthrough is a unique and challenging adventure.
Blood Manipulation Combat: Harness the power of blood to manipulate your surroundings, defeat formidable enemies, and overcome treacherous obstacles.
Captivating 2D Platforming: Test your agility and reflexes as you navigate meticulously crafted levels filled with intricate platforming challenges.
Dynamic Choices: Make meaningful decisions that shape your character's development, forging your own path in this ever-evolving world.
Stunning Art and Atmosphere: Immerse yourself in a visually stunning hand-drawn art style and a captivating atmospheric soundtrack.
Secrets and Discoveries: Uncover hidden treasures, unravel ancient secrets, and unlock new abilities that will aid you on your quest.
Are you ready to embark on an unforgettable journey that challenges your skills and confronts the gods themselves? Begin your hunt and reshape the destiny of the divine in this gripping roguelike adventure!"

content_descriptors.notes: Oblation does not avoid mature content while emphasizing romance. Also Oblation uses mature content for heavier story and drama
